title: Dimension Door
content:
Dimension Door Level 4 Conjuration Spell Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. The ally cannot be larger than medium. Melee Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Level 4 Conjuration Spell

Teleport yourself and up to 1 adjacent ally to a place you can see. The ally cannot be larger than medium.
